website_summaries.verdict: A great posture brace to try if you require full back support, but keep in mind that it won’t offer the same levels of comfort or discretion as smaller varieties.
pros: Pulls the shoulders back while providing thoracic and lumbar support to help straighten the entire back
Can help relieve both upper and lower back pain
Full back design eliminates the need to purchase 2 separate braces
Includes an informational booklet with handy posture improvement exercises and tips
cons: Can be a bit bulky and uncomfortable to wear under clothing
Some owners find that the lumbar support band rides up when bending over or sitting

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Product!
customer_reviews.text: It was adjustable in the right places, and so far, as long as I've kept to the instructions and recommendations - it's been comfortable enough to add to my day without feeling like it's not doing anything. I can definitely tell a difference between what I thought was me standing up "straight" and what is actually standing up straight - real difference. I'm going to keep up with it (some of the exercises I'm so not ready for yet! ) because I think it will help my sciatica and I really think it's going to be preventative medicine as I get older.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie Coleman

customer_reviews.title: I don't use it anywhere else mainly because it's too bulky to be worn comfortably under clothing
customer_reviews.text: It's okay...it's bulky and takes a little trial-and-error to find the correct lengths. I use it when sitting at my desk to keep my from slouching while I'm working at my desk. I don't use it anywhere else mainly because it's too bulky to be worn comfortably under clothing. This is good for around the house use and office/desk use; however, in my opinion, not so good for outside/outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davidov

customer_reviews.title: poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This product is smaller than advertise and material quality is poor. After using it for over a month it broke and I can not longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Extra Arm Padding
customer_reviews.text: The stupid q&a interface won't let me answer the questions about the extra pads, so here is the answer for the extra pads and this relates to arm padding. There are two extra pads that come with the product. I found the harness to be difficult to wear for more than 30 min at a time till I figured out that if you roll the pads up, the extra pads are padded sleeves for one's armpits. Shown is one rolled around the arm and one flat. Hope this helps. Overall I find it really comfortable and I wear it for 4-6 hours a day. I'm 5'10", 177cm with a 34", 85cm waist and the Large seems just right.
customer_reviews.author: K Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The product doesn't help with back posture whatsoever. The straps around the arms are uncomfortable and feel like they're going to leave a mark if I wear them for more than a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the customer support team is Great! This brace was too short for me
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this no stars, but the customer support team is Great! This brace was too short for me. I'm a tall lanky person at 6'1" and around 145lbs. I'm right between medium and large according to the size chart, but it came in too short. It also has no support in the area of my back where I need it (lower mid back, a few down from shoulder blades. Right about where the opening is). I emailed and told customer support this, and they refunded me very quickly. Though I'm dissatisfied with their product, their customer support is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Berry

customer_reviews.title: Stitching is weak in key areas.
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this item. I have only had this for less than a month with only 5 actual uses and the strap ripped out already. Waste of money since there is no option for refund or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell D.

customer_reviews.title: Good product! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This thing works wonders and it's been keeping my posture correct for most of the day. I got used to it and now find it comfortable wearing it almost all day. I notice a big difference in energy and easier breathing. I also noticed that i walk better now and keep my shoulders backwards. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Back Brace
customer_reviews.text: Hi, the brace is great (when I remember to put it on) I have lover back pain and pain in between in my shoulders blades and the pressure the brace gives me in between my shoulders feels good. If I follow the instructions and wear everyday for a bit I believe that the shoulder pain will go away. My lower back pain is due to an accident so that probably will never go away but the support the brace gives is awesome. Seller is awesome as to any help or questions.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for us
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I both have chronic back pain, so I got this as a gift for him. Honestly, it didn't really work; it's far too soft of a brace and you can barely adjust it without another person if you have it on. He tried it first and said it wasn't for him, so I tried it, and it provide little to no support. A waist trainer works way better for me. So, useless for us, I'm afraid.
customer_reviews.author: Femme

customer_reviews.title: Effective Posture Corrector
customer_reviews.text: The Back Brace Posture Corrector won't force the wearer to *not* to slouch - it instead *encourages* correct posture in a comfortable and effective manner (I've been wearing it for about a week of extended daily use underneath my shirts, directly against my body). It is reasonably priced and an excellent option for someone seeking to correct their posture. It *won't* transform your posture into something like a Marine drill sergeant's overnight, it *will* help you get started to to better posture. I'm a 5'9" male, weigh 140, and size Large fit me nicely, only adjustment was pulling the shoulder straps as tight as possible.
customer_reviews.author: MarcosGee

customer_reviews.title: Painful in the armpit area-Nearly impossible for removal
customer_reviews.text: Having fractured C7 along with multiple spinal surgeries, was really looking forward to this posture correction brace. First time I tried to put it on; I thought I had something backwards? Re-read instructions, looked at photos-not me. I am a small person, only 5'-8" with a 33-34" waist and no gutt. I tried multiple times to wear this item and had to remove it immediately for the mass discomfort caused to underarm areas. Max length adjustment still left the straps Super Tight! Great initial thought-Needs more adjustment and other straps to pull underarm strap forward, plus plastic or metal stays in back support area. Sorry-had to request return-Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smythe

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable and effective back brace.
customer_reviews.text: As a back supporter I found it quite good, and to a lesser extent it helps to straighten shoulders as well. I have been able to wear it for several hours a day with no significant discomfort. As to a few reviewers who mentioned sweating, I have not yet heard of any effective back brace that involves no perspiration; when wearing this device for strenuous events, I simply put it on over an undershirt.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Casale

customer_reviews.title: *THOSE WHO HAVE SENSITIVE SKIN BEWARE!*
customer_reviews.text: This product caused me to have an awful skin rash around my entire waste line. This is one of the worst rashes I've ever had and I'm disappointed because I really wanted to like this. It served me well on a six-hour road trip and has helped my back feel less fatigued after a long day, but I have to stop wearing after this awful rash!! Update: I just spent $45 on scar creams and anti-itch creams to offset the effects this posture corrector had on me. If my skin scars and it doesn’t go away, I will have grapefruit-sized scars all over my stomach and love handles as a direct result of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does it work ? Doubtful
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for about 1-2 months now and I feel like it DOES try to pull the shoulders back...but it does little else besides that. In my opinion the only solution to a bad posture is to fix it during your every day life. Exercise is also important, but I doubt any "posture corrector" is going to fix your issue alone. I only gave it 3 stars because I feel like it DOES try to enforce you to hold those shoulders back, but there is other elements that goes into posture that obviously this does not affect. It's also a tad uncomfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Keeping Good Posture
customer_reviews.text: This back brace definitely assisted me to reinforce a good posture behavior while working/sitting. This product to me is not comfortable around the armpit region at all its got a scratchy feeling to it and is not comfortable in the least if you were to have this under a shirt or wearing just this for up top. For posture reasons and price and build quality seems rather sturdy to me but knocking one star off due to the scratchy feeling especially around the shoulders and armpit area.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: it took about 6 months ,but it works. i wear it on the elliptical in the morning for about 45 min. i also wear sitting while on the computer ,maybe an hour a day. i now walk upstairs on the balls of my feet, with full balance. i had low back discomfort, the posture support has eliminated that totally.so between helping my balance and correcting my posture ,i would say it works.
customer_reviews.author: P. I. SIRIUS BLACK

customer_reviews.title: Improved posture through mindfulness
customer_reviews.text: Got it in two days, fantastic! Before reading the follow up courteous email I wore it with no sleeve top. The email suggested tshirts, which reduce pinching under arms. I'm not exactly sure how to adjust the arms but the product seems to be working well for me straight out of the box. I need to be working on my posture to reduce symptoms from pinched nerves in my cervical spine areas. I am slowly building up time wearing it, starting with less than a hour at first. It is making me mindful of my posture but doesn't restrict my movements. So far it has been considered a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mom sak

customer_reviews.title: Useless junk
customer_reviews.text: Followed the sizing chart and ordered the recommended size, L 30" - 35", for my 33" waist, and it was way too large with practically no adjustment available. Instead of having a stretchy material with Velcro, the shoulder straps are nylon webbing with no give and hard plastic buckles. They are more likely to injure your shoulders than help your posture. It's a very, very poor design. You might cut the top off and use the bottom part for lumbar support but, why bother? There are many other similar products here on Amazon. This one went straight into the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Verloc

customer_reviews.title: Posture corrector review
customer_reviews.text: This product is as described, and seem to add that support but after a week the back portion just seem to provide nothing, so it was not making me straighten up as needed. Would recommend the center back portion to be more firmer to provide more support to backthat will pull shoulders back. The waist band and straps bare good mid section support. So not wearing much. So would not recommend or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Customer support and product performance
customer_reviews.text: This works great, exact fit, and really helps me with my posture and lower back support. I would recommend to anyone who is looking for lower back support. The posture will take a little long to get used to but I definitely notice the difference. Finally, the biggest thing for me wasnt just the way the product worked but at the customer support. Their whole support team helped me through a billing error and the whole thing was resovled in a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Xbox GT: II R1KU II

customer_reviews.title: If you tighten the straps that are around the arms enough for the brace to provide support and straighten posture it's very uncomfortable and painful under the arms
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this brace according to the weight chart. If you tighten the straps that are around the arms enough for the brace to provide support and straighten posture it's very uncomfortable and painful under the arms. If you loosen the straps you loose the upper back support. The lumbar section is very limited in how much it can be tightened because of the Velcro pads. The overlapping outside piece of the lumbar section does not secure to anything and flops. I would return this brace but it's been wore 5 times in trying to make it work and I didn't keep the packaging. I'm going to look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Queeneee

customer_reviews.title: Take it slow
customer_reviews.text: I'm an older guy with years of poor posture. Instructions and guidelines clearly said to ease into use and limit time when first using. However, my back hurt after first day so I over-did it. Back was fine the next morning, but the device is training my unused back muscles that are being re=trained to provide better posture. just go sow at first.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Great support, easy to use, good value
customer_reviews.text: Great product, really helps my posture. I have been working on exercises to strengthen my posture mussels but this brace is just what I was looking for for the final push. It really helps reduce stress when lifting heavy items! As proof I just shoveled 4 pickup truck loads of shell mix on to my driveway and have no back pain! Last year the project without the brace was painful.
customer_reviews.author: ICW Voyager

customer_reviews.title: This brace does help a lot but what I don't like about it is
customer_reviews.text: I injured my back in a factory a year ago and have been wearing back braces ever since to reduce the pain. This brace does help a lot but what I don't like about it is, I wish there were more padding around the arms cause it will rub your skin a lot. Also the bottom half of the brace near the waist likes to ride up a lot no matter how tight it is which makes the brace not the best. But overall it has helped out my pain a lot and it will fix your posture some as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It takes time to fix a poor posture. My only recommendation would be to add ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this posture brace for approx. one week and it appears to be working. It takes time to fix a poor posture. My only recommendation would be to add additional velcro on the waist adjustment strap. I need to tighten it past the 1-1/2 inch velco strip on one side of the strap. The end of the strap remains loose, sticks up.
customer_reviews.author: MTBNortheast

customer_reviews.title: Straightens back immediately if properly adjusted
customer_reviews.text: Used initial settings of straps and put armpit cushions around shoulder straps. Velcroed up and immediately felt my back go into a straight-up position. Wow! Didn't expect that pleasant surprise. Best $25.99 I ever spent!
customer_reviews.author: DogRescuer, TX

customer_reviews.title: Have to wear it to believe it!
customer_reviews.text: Abnormal situation with the removal of the back brace, I like the help and support that the back brace provides. Normal support, I like this back brace better than the individual waste strap. Maybe in the future the brace may help with cooling, I like the support and dislike getting out of the brace. The shoulder support is not so bad, I mean considering on size and compare results to posture later. I'll see.
customer_reviews.author: ImmGonz

customer_reviews.title: Great product for posture and mild scoliosis. Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Truly thankful I found this product. I bought two others at the same time, and they don’t quite fit as comfortably. This back support helps correct my posture, and doesn’t interfere with what I wear. I wear dresses and seamless shirts to work. On the other hand, I have been diagnosed with mild scoliosis; this brace helps a lot, and my Dr was surprised with how my posture has improved after a month! I highly recommend this product, plus the customer service team is very friendly! Thank you so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Y L

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: Great back support, after using this my posture has improved and since my job forces me to walk a lot and be stand up all day it helps a lot. before I had back pain every single day but after using it...all changed for the better. they should improve the design of the belly part since it is not as adaptable as it can be for thin people like me. But nevertheless, it does its job and properly!
customer_reviews.author: iLx

customer_reviews.title: not Worth purchasing 4 me!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly save ur money! Yes I’m saying it and I go to Walmart once in a while cause it’s so close! After I returned this one cause it wasn’t adjustable to perfection, I got red mark on my shoulder for a week tacky, I was standing in line saw a bk brace! The best!!!! And it wasn’t about the money but in this case it turned out less cheap and better quality! Get it Walmart brand🤫it works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Will not be a cure all.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made, not overpriced. Helps somewhat to keep me from slouching when practicing the piano. Somewhat uncomfortable in the armpits. Makes my back perspire. All in all it helps relieve my lower back pain but I was hoping for more. Did not receive the exercise booklet as advertised, after reading the pamphlet it is available on line.
customer_reviews.author: Jack A. Herring

customer_reviews.title: This product sucks
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks. The shoulder adjustments are under your arm pits. Making it impossible to adjust while wearing. Putting it on per adjusted is like trying to get out of a straight jacket. The back brace doesn't adjust AT ALL. So if you're over '5"6 it wraps around your diaphragm. ( exaggerating. but not as much as you'd like) the ONLY good thing I can say about this product is apparently it lasted a yr some how. DO. NOT. BUY....... Oh, yea. It died. I broke it wearing it at the gym. Which is what I brought it for...
customer_reviews.author: Brione

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item for my sweetheart. She manufactures pocket doors using pneumatic equipment, pushing, lifting... very physical labor. She complained of back pain daily. She wears it primarily for posture correction however her back pain was just about gone after the second full day of use. She is very pleased with the results and wished she owned one 9 months ago. On the plus side, it accents her figure! Gotta like that! : )
customer_reviews.author: Carlos B.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: For me, it's a pain in the ass. My back is crooked. I bought this to see if it will help. It helps a little. I'm neither disappointed or enthused. I suppose if you have slight issues. This will help. Also the velcro doesn't stick. After several uses the velcro detaches. Very annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Get the one size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend and after using for 1day he complained a painful part on the underarm. Its useful and effective but the only down side for this is the plastic to adjust on the underarm is painful when repetitive and continues use. I just wish that adjusting part will just be on the backside not on the underarm.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Did quite a bit of shopping around before I bought this brace, and honestly I am very pleased with the product. This one was comparable to some others with twice the price tag, so I was concerned the quality may be a little below par. However, I could not be more wrong as the quality is great. Very sturdy, and provides more support than anticipated actually. Comfortable too. The extra padding included really helps. Also a helpful hint...DO NOT fall asleep while wearing this. I did accidentally, and woke with up to both of my arms being completly numb lol. I don't think it did any damage, but it was pretty scary waking up like that.
customer_reviews.author: BLT jr.

customer_reviews.title: The brace is great for the money and posture
customer_reviews.text: The brace is great for the money and posture. I wish the back support was a little thicker and more heavy duty but for the price it’s not bad. Instead ofBeing heavy duty and not allowing your muscles to learn the right position it helps your muscles with muscle memory and helps them learn the correct posture. Also the manufacturers keep in contact to ask how it is working for the individual and ask if there’s anything they could do to make things better. Just of them keeping in touch and making sure I was satisfied was an amazing thing. They even offered to send me a different size if the one I ordered was too big or small.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Immediate relief right away.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I suffer from back pain and this back brace posture has helped us with that. After receiving our order, I ordered another Back Brace Posture Corrector right away for my daughter too as she has a mild case of scoliosis and is in pain often. My daughter notice the immediate relief right away. I have ordered other posture braces but they weren't comfortable to the point I didn't want to use them for too long. I highly recommend this product, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: That it fit
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was tagged as a Large. Now I have a 43" chest which puts me in a high medium level, so this Large product should have been easy to adjust to fit. Unfortunately, the product was about 3 sized tooooooo small. No amount of adjustment, and there wasn't much there, would allow me even get into the device. So I sent it back and will take my refund and run.
customer_reviews.author: BillP65

customer_reviews.title: Keep your back straight
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but doesn’t work personally for me.... I’m a chef, have to live a lot, bend etc and unfortunately this produc doesn’t work for me :( tho it does keep your back straight, would be perfect for working at home or in office but not working for me personally
customer_reviews.author: Igor Ivanchuk

customer_reviews.title: A practical, comfy intro to posture correction garments.
customer_reviews.text: Being a designer, I’m often at a desk looking down at papers or at a computer screen. So, I definitely struggle with maintaining (and remembering to maintain) good posture. This is my first posture “garment.” With it, I liked being able to adjust the garment with the straps (instead of it being one large piece, without any adjustability). I also appreciate that the inside of it was sufficiently cushioned and nothing dug into/irritated my skin, which would discourage me from considering this as an aid if that happened. I look forwar to seeing how this helps me improve/retrain my posture awareness as time goes on!
customer_reviews.author: R.A.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I always have been a sloucher and it finally caught up with me. After doing PT for a month, I decided to be proactive in preventing a reoccurence. I looked at many different posture correctors, but this one seemed to be thoughtfully made. I am glad that I went with it. I can wear it all day at work and not have a problem with comfort. Best of all, I find myself sitting up straighter even when I don't have it on. I am going to buy another just to have a spare.
customer_reviews.author: gasman94

customer_reviews.title: Wow this really showed me how bad my posture had gotten sitting at the computer all day for decades
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made and comfortable product. I am only 5'11" and picked the "large" size and it is almost too small vertically as I have a long torso. It fits very well otherwise, I have this issue with off the shelf shirts as well so I am just a freak in that sense. :-) I slept with it on the first night and it was the first night without any neuro-pain in the feet and legs in months. Works very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: This back brace has certainly helped to straighten up the posture and relief back pain. It is unconfortable to use in the beginning then in a couple days grew used to it and hardly noticed. Except that we live in the hot tropics and when outside the sweat and heat makes it unconfortable again. At those times I losen up the strap and let go for half an hour. Good instructive summary pamphlet too.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo D.

customer_reviews.title: Great help and solves the back pain!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it helps me keep my posture upright while (sitting) working on my computer and standing and walking. i feel that it has enough body support while being discreet. I wore it for several hours and I didn't have any back pain that night and I really appreciate that because that's a constant issue for me. I did the posture exercises while wearing the posture corrector and it was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: GraceyG

customer_reviews.title: Back Brace Posture Corrector
customer_reviews.text: Received brace on time from Amazon. I have two questions: 1) is the brace suppose to fit tight and 2) what are these things for, no where in the instructions does it show what these are for and where to the go. Poor instructions from company who makes these. They don't realize that this is the first time people are wearing this brace. An explanation of every part should be explained.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest L. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I very much like this product. It did not reduce my pain in my back 100 percent, but I could tell the difference when I walk. Used it everyday for an hour or two until I lost it at the airport. I only had it for about a month. The airport security opened my suitcase, but failed to zip it all the way back shut and I lost it. I plan to purchase another one when I am paid. I really liked the product. It was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Better than some, but not great
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, this brace has a waist band that anchors it down. I have found this to be really important in achieve it's purpose. There are unfortunately some design and materials issues. The straps tended to loosen on their own, which was annoying. I found the waist band design a bit clumsy. In general there was a bit too much stretch to the material. Eventually the brace also ripped a bit at one of the key tension points.
customer_reviews.author: GWSTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No upper back suport
customer_reviews.text: The lumbar support is just fine. With adjustment it will fit - you must put forth the effort to do the adjustments. Yes, helps a BIT with posture (shoulders back) Con: NO upper back support. Con: Extremely difficult to take off (shoulder straps). A second person would be nice. Do not recommend for back support alone.
customer_reviews.author: K. Demerjian

customer_reviews.title: Advise you don’t use without clothing under...
customer_reviews.text: The product was comfortable but after one day wearing it felt like my back was chemically burned. I wore all day Friday and off Saturday then Sunday woke up to the sensation of pins and needles. Looking at my back it’s clear I reacted to something in the product. This is the first time I’ve reacted adversely to anything. Going forward I would recommend not wearing on bare skin and having a shirt buffer.
customer_reviews.author: iLochtefeld

customer_reviews.title: Good but started giving me neck pain
customer_reviews.text: This one started giving me more pain on my neck. I purchased it for my backpain which is caused due to my posture issues. Though it gives good support to the shoulders I started feeling stressed on my neck causing pain. Also this is only for the upper body correction. There is no support on the lower body Irrespective of that it is made of good material, has very good adjustable straps and fit for all sizes. If it had not caused any pain, I would have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Haripriya

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit large. Stitching coming undone after 2 hours of use
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived well packaged, and lots of extra info cards etc. Ive only had two opportunities to wear this as I’ve only had it for 3 days. Now for the bad. First I noticed that the L is actually a bit big (I wear a 32 waist in Levi’s if you want a brand to use as reference), it barley fits me. I also just noticed that already the stitching on strap is coming undone at both corners.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Made my back fell great but pulled at my shoulders so bad I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Made my back fell great but pulled at my shoulders so bad I had to get a lidocaine shot just to function. Depends on the strength in you shoulders to hold you straight can be a huge stress after a few hours
customer_reviews.author: Major Legrand

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth your money. I returned mine because my chiropractor said it made little or no difference. I have residual pain for a Car accident and this did absolutely nothing to help with the pain. It also was not comfortable and chafed my armpits. I have an athletic female build. I don’t know how heavier people would fare if I had issues.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Howson

customer_reviews.title: Great brace, works well, but is too painful to use
customer_reviews.text: I am a well endowed woman - and this brace *hurts* It works, very well, but it is painful. The shoulder/arm straps cut into my armpit/breast causing me to discontinue wear. It works quite well - fatiguing my muscles quickly, but I can't wear it due to the design
customer_reviews.author: Miss M

customer_reviews.title: Works, if you let it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this because I needed it, I bought this as a gentle proactive nudge to stop slouching at the desk. It works best in that regard, can't really see someone with a physical job wearing it for long. It's mostly comfortable, but you never forget it is there. Wearing it under a shirt on bare skin is not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Simple Sign

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, made well, and makes me stand up stright when wearing it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back brace because it was recommended to me by neighbor/ co-worker. When I wear the back brace my wife has told me that my posture looks better and that I look taller since I am standing up stright. Since I have not had the back brace for long enough, I really cannot say if my posture has improved when I take it off. Overall, I think the back brace will eventually help me.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M

customer_reviews.title: Back Brace Posture Corrector
customer_reviews.text: This Back Brace is made a good quality. It it a bit difficult to wear/get uses to, when wearing because the Brace is correcting the way you stand and hold yourself. But once you get use to the Brace you don't even notice that you're still wearing it. And when you corrected the way you stand and hold yourself you have less pain in time and you also look better and slimmer but you stand more up right and your stomach look smaller also.
customer_reviews.author: LunarHart

customer_reviews.title: This brace has been the best so far for rectifying this situation
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a professional musician and spends long hours at the piano. This can sometimes result in his hunching over. This brace has been the best so far for rectifying this situation. He says it's also the most comfortable and well made that he's seen for the money. I also want to add that as braces go, this one seems to show the least through his clothes. We will be making another purchase of this product some time soon I am certain.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Relieve at last!
customer_reviews.text: Working in a desk is a strain on the body, after purchasing this brace, simply using it for a few hours provides a good psture without having to force myself. It allows me to sit up straight and definitely relievs all that strain from sitting. It sometimes slides up, and can get a bit tight, but it is very easy to remove and readjust. But happy to have proper back support again!
customer_reviews.author: Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. Fits well and helps adjust bad posture with the added benefit of supporting the lower back. I have arthritis in lower/mid back. Does have a extra strap that's cushions for underarms but no matter what you do it will start to chaff slightly no fault of product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Fellows

customer_reviews.title: Probably works better separate from each other
customer_reviews.text: The posture corrector part of the product seems to work well, it keeps my shoulders back. However, something about the back brace part of the product adds a lot of strain to back. I might be too tall for the product or using it wrong however.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good for Relieving Back Pain
customer_reviews.text: I recently lost over 100lbs. In doing so reviled bad posture that would cause serious back fatigue. I figured I had to retrain my back to support my body correctly. While wearing this, I stand up taller, and can go all day on my feet without back pain. Its been about 3 weeks, and I still can't go without wearing the posture corrector, but things are getting better on my own. Since the waist part bulges at the front, its hard to conceal, but its not too terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Randaman622

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: Returning this. It’s well made but I wanted a brace with some support. The back of this has no structure, it’s just a piece of soft cloth, so it basically has as much support at a low back brace attached to a tank top.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Ordered an XL
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL. I am a 5'1 not round or wide. need to work on my posture, but when i put it on it pulled me back so tight, the bottom strap that hugs your abdomen area strapped around my chest area. i do not know what XL person they measured for this.
customer_reviews.author: Julie cota

customer_reviews.title: Good support.
customer_reviews.text: I've had bad posture for 70 years. Recently, due to a fall, I have a Winged Scapula injury. I've tried several different back braces to help alleviate pain. This one is by far the most effective. I also wear it loosely during sleep and it helps me sleep through the nignt and wake with no pain.
customer_reviews.author: William Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Works well the first few days but definitely a product ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well the first few days but definitely a product more so for people who don't actively work out (less than 30 hours a week). If you have any upper body strength this is not for you as even the tightest setting simply will not pull your shoulders back sufficiently/ keep your back from arching. However, if you don't really work out, are at home all day or have an office job, which doesn't allow you to work out a lot and you have a natural tendency to arch your back, maybe it will work then...however not 100% sure.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the X larger after reading the reviews. I'm 5'11 and weigh 190 and it was way too small for me. Once I put it on I couldn't get it off and actually had to cut the strap around the arm/shoulder. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This brace doesn't do anything, it's a waste of money. Bought size based on recommendations and can slouch like usual only difference is now u have annoying straps in your armpit
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stark

customer_reviews.title: Texture extremely rough
customer_reviews.text: I really want to adjust my posture, and due to the great review I picked this one. The texture of this product is extremely uncomfortable. I only wore it for 5-10 minutes and it’s making a rash on my shoulders and armpits (textures very rough)
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I just received my Back Brace Posture Corrector in a large. I'm a little disappointed because I followed the measurement chart based on my waist size & weight, so ordered a LARGE since that was what was recommended on the chart, but I think the length is too long? When I put it on, the waist strap is suppose to wrap around the waist, but it actually goes quite below the waistline, lower abdomen, so then it ends up riding up. Is this product more structured for a male frame vs female? Should I go down a size to a MEDIUM my waist is 33.5, weight 143.5 lbs?
customer_reviews.author: egleason

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm trying to get used to it. I have 5 of my vertebrae fused from an accident. I've been developing pain in my muscles lately. Hoping this may help. Initially I bought a large which was just a little too small. They rushed me a replacement, one size higher after realizing my goof. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic posture support
customer_reviews.text: This has drastically helped me with my posture, after a car accident I’ve had on & off back trouble but one issue I constantly have is standing up straight hurts the middle of my back. I originally adjusted it so the lower brace was under my ribs but after reading the instructions like I should’ve done in the first place and placing it on my lower ribs it added all the support I needed. Definitely wear an undershirt Luke they tell you to because it will punch the armpits a little. I can honestly say I have no complaints and if I damage it I will definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: chris logan

customer_reviews.title: Really works!! Comfortable and pain free!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic shoulder / neck pain from poor posture, plus lower back pain from piriformis syndrome. I have been to physical therapy and it was moderately well controlled. That is until I'm stuck working at home! This brace provides critical core support so that shoulders can be aligned as they should be. It also comes with a great little booklet. It will take a few days for your back to adjust. I was sore for a day or two, but that's because my muscles were engaged in a different way. I find it works best right on the skin, but it's also good over an undershirt.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hass

customer_reviews.title: It helped my pain in back... but....
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help my lower back pain, as a Photographer I bend alot and walk. This helps with my back, but I have to keep adjusting n adjusting the velcro everytime I bend down, it gets very anoring. It rides up my waist sideways. I just don't use it very much as I thought I would when purchased because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Camera Kid

customer_reviews.title: Best back brace ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing customer service I gave them 10🌟they really want customers to be happy with purchase, they reach out to me after my order arrived and accommodate my needs the back brace it’s strong great material my boyfriend it’s been using it since the moment it arrived, he feels better stand straight and his posture it’s improving!!! Highly recommend two thumbs ups 👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Shelly🌺

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting more...
customer_reviews.text: Frankly; I was very disappointed. First; no doubt in my mind its poorly made. Secondly; I wear size 44R and according to the measurement chart posted on Amazon; I ordered the Large size and it was very tight. I did not feel any kind of relief and/or support; especially for my shoulders and my lower back. Additionally; it is very uncomfortable. I am planning on return it.
customer_reviews.author: outraged

customer_reviews.title: support comfort
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these due to a sore back and needed more back support. Idea of support up the back and under the arms sounded sensible. The belt portion of the device is very good. The part that goes up the back helps mainly to remind you to keep posture straight but the back strap is not rigid enough. Underarm straps are uncomfortable and sweaty. I did cut the back portion off from the belt and now enjoy the belt quite a bit. Just get a good waist back support belt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Back Brace Posture Corrector is definitely a well-made product.
customer_reviews.text: The Back Brace Posture Corrector is definitely a well-made product. It arrived just recently and I haven't had a chance to use it very much, but it's very comfortable and I think it's constructed in such a way to keep the spine aligned properly with the shoulder straps and the waist strap. And the fact that it's fully adjustable is a definite plus. I think the price is very reasonable for such a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B.

customer_reviews.title: No instructions or booklet and is uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The item came well packaged but did not have any instructions or manual as the description said it would. It was not very comfortable at all. I wasn’t sure if I needed the large or extra large based on my weight I was right at the crossover point of 190. I went with the large and it does not fit well at all. The product may work well for some but I believe I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Matcha

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Back Brace Posture Corrector and the metal rods used to provide support began digging into my back during the first wear. I've had other support garments (different companies) and this one was the worst. The other ones lasted for up to two years. This one was "one and done!"
customer_reviews.author: Lady T

customer_reviews.title: Works instantly
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I put it on I felt some relief on my lower back. I had to adjust it a little tight and it digs into my under arm, but I could really feel it correcting my posture. I think I will prefer to wear a shirt underneath to prevent chafing, but any regular button-up hides it pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer_amz2365

customer_reviews.title: Not for lower back pain issues
customer_reviews.text: it was too uncomfortable to wear and as a result had to return it. Needed something more for the lower back pain but this didnt help alleviate that issue.
customer_reviews.author: AviD Shoppie

customer_reviews.title: I weigh 170 and bought the one that was for ...
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 170 and bought the one that was for someone 140-180 or whatever, and it is WAAAYYY too large. It doesn't pull my shoulders back at all. Instead of taking it back, I just cut the straps and used some string to make it tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel55645

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: First off, when I received this product a major piece of the stretch bands had busted the threads holding it in place. Then after getting it sewn back on, it doesn’t work. The whole thing is super stretchy. It has zero support. I can’t even feel a difference whether it’s on or off. Complete waste of money. Do not buy this! I wish I could give this zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Effective and controls pain!
customer_reviews.text: This Back brace is effective, and helps control pain. It has also adjusted my body to a good body posture and I think I can feel the spines being more aligned now. I wear this during exercise and normally or more so when I have pain in my right upper back. It helps control and presses against it if I tighten it. It is uncomfortable in your armpits and stomach gets bit sweaty, but it’s probably the best back brace I’ve wore.
customer_reviews.author: Gurudev Dhimal

customer_reviews.title: I had shoulder surgery recently and bought this brace to ...
customer_reviews.text: I had shoulder surgery recently and bought this brace to make sure my posture is where it should be but I have to wait until it heals enough to wear it regularly. I did try it on briefly and I have to say that I think this will work very well for me. I will update my feedback as time goes on but I'm optimistic that this will help me out in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Takes sometime to get used to it, but it does the job. Unlike the photo, you don't want to wear it on your skin. The shoulders strap will rub against your skin and it's uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ZMan

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: More so than the 3-5 other braces I've tried to help straighten nout my back and relieve lower back pain, this one showed the best results. The materials have stretched a bit, butnive worn it a lot and slept in it, so really putting it through the ringer.
customer_reviews.author: explainer guy

customer_reviews.title: Discrete, does it's job for posture, but uncomfortable in armpits
customer_reviews.text: It did feel like it was helping to correct my postural issues, however the straps that you put your arms through, that sit on your shoulders, was very irritating in my arm pits. My undershirt would bunch up where the straps would sit and it was very uncomfortable. I tried tightening, loosening it, nothing seemed to work. I returned the brave bc I couldn't get through an 8hr shift with it on. I must say that under a dress shirt no one could notice I was wearing a brace, very discrete.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Spehar

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product
customer_reviews.text: I guess one size cannot fit all. I have a slim waist and broad shoulders. So I ordered accoding to my waist, but it is uncomfortable around the arms. It is however, a good product and it does help relieve the pain from my scoliosis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So so..
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this for a few days and i can tell its working. I wore ot way too long the first day and my shoulders were sore. Now the bad. Im aboit 6ft and 180lbs and i ordered a L. The arm straps dig into my armpits right where the 2 materials meet. And i have to always pull the torse strap down. When im wearing it i cant really do anything. Its difficult to bend over, turn, etc. will give it a couple more days but i think ill return it
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: It feels like it works, but material its not good
customer_reviews.text: It feels like it works, but material its not good, didnt last me more than 4 wears, in less than 2 weeks until one of the straps broke, and im not an obese guy.
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome product, I have never thought about one of these before but noticed it one Facebook and gave it a try. It really works, totally improved my posture and made me stand like 1" taller, brought my shoulders back and raised my neck and head. I am pushing 60 years old and I work out 4-5 times per week, but still had some back issues, this is a keeper for sure. Can get a little hot and rubs under the arm pits, but otherwise a great product. Getting one for my wife!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Roche

customer_reviews.title: Good Brace, Great Company
customer_reviews.text: It feels good on my lower back. The upper straps kind of dig into my arm pits but I guess it's a reminder to keep your shoulders back. I ordered a large but emailed the company that it might be too small and they were kind enough to send me an Extra Large for free. If anything the company is very thoughtful and largely the reason I'm even leaving this review. Overall this brace helps to keep my back straight, if anything it may need more upper shoulder support.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product just not the right fit!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return as it was not comfortable and didn’t seem to do as much support as anticipated when tried on! It honestly looked like an amazing product, durable and all! It just wasn’t the fit for my husband so that’s why he returned it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT IS OK, BUT COULD BE BETTER .... DOESNT TIGHTEN MUCH, SO U CAN FEEL IT WORKING. ITS JUST A BRACE THAT REMAINS YOU TO ADJUST YOUR POSTURE, BUT REALLY DOESNT PULL OR TIGHTEN YOUR SHOULDERS BACK FOR A GOOD POSTURE.
customer_reviews.author: juan m fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Relieves back pain
customer_reviews.text: This is great, it has relieved back pain when even narcatic medication wasn't working! Not only is it going to help with posture but helped with pain. This is being used on a loved one with scoliosis and sports injury to the back.
customer_reviews.author: Tracyjm30

customer_reviews.title: meh...
customer_reviews.text: I cant seem to get this to fit right. While it does draw attention to your posture I cant wear it for more than about 20 min before it starts to hurt my under arms. The problem is if I loosen it I no longer feel like it corrects my posture...
customer_reviews.author: jackie

product_meta.title: Back Brace Posture Corrector for Men & Women - Adjustable Back Straightener for Posture Correction - Builds Muscle Memory - Provides Neck, Shoulder, Lower & Upper Back Pain Relief. (Large)

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
